entry.title: Not able to cancel AR Credit MEMO based on Sales Order
entry.content:
Hello Community,

After creating a AR credit MEMO now I need to cancel it as it was wrongly created now when performing cancel , system is showing this message " Cancellation is not possible; base orders reopened"

Is there any way out for this ?

entry.title: Project Management: Relating objects to a project (subproject) as a total, not every item-line
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

When I relate an object to a project - a quotation for example - every item-line is listed separately as a related object.  So if I have 100 items in the quotation, I get 100 related objects in my project (or subproject).

Is there any way I can relate an object as a total? In just one line?

Kind regards and thanks in advance 🙂

entry.title: Delete Imported Fixed Assets Master Data
entry.content:
I am using SAPB1 v10
I had import a range of Fixed Assets Master Data during new fiscal year start and no any depreciation running. One of the user accidentally select one of Fixed Assets Master Data used in a Purchase Order and GRN. Then user cancel both GRN and PO. Now this Fixed Assets Master Data not going to be use anymore and mgmt want to delete or inactive it.
However, I cannot delete it due to document applied and I also cannot retirement it because this items is wrong imported (FA item code is wrong key in).
How can I delete or inactive it?

entry.title: Need help with SP_TransactionNotification
entry.content:
I have this UDO IVZ_DOC_AT without an audit table.

I need to block all users except 124 from adding or updating tasks.

My script is:

IF ( :object_type = 'IVZ_DOC_AT' AND (:transaction_type = 'A' OR :transaction_type = 'U'))
 
THEN 
cnt :=0;
 
SELECT COUNT ("UserSign") INTO cnt FROM "@IVZ_DOC_AT" WHERE "Code" = :list_of_cols_val_tab_del AND ("UserSign" <> 124) ;
 
If cnt > 0 
Then
error := 994;
error_message := 'Usted no es un usuario autorizado para modificar el Objeto'||' '||cnt;
End if;
 
END IF;
 
The problem is the UDO's UserSign allways is 124 because is the addon's user and that creates all records. 
In case the user wants to create a new doc, the block works ok; otherwise, if the user must update info, the result of the query is cnt = 0 because the UserSign is always 124.
 
How can I proceed with this block in SP_TN?
 
Thank you a lot, and sorry about my English.
 
JP

entry.title: Error al cancelar asiento
entry.content:
Hola, compañeros,

Tengo un cliente que está trabajando con la versión 10.00.280. nos hemos encontrado el problema que cuando vamos a cancelar un asiento nos borra el importe de la primera linea y como nos deja editarlo nos indica el erro de que el asiento no esta compensado.

Ejemplo:

Tengo un asiento:

hacemos click derecho en cancelar

Como veis me elimina el saldo de la primera linea, sin posibilidad de ser editado y por correspondiente cancelado, ya que el asiento no está compensado.

Al intentar tres o cuatro veces el intento de cancelar acaba haciendo bien el asiento y permite cancelarlo.

 

¿alguna idea de porque no arrastra bien los saldos al cancelar?

 

un saludo

Any advice will be highly appreciated.

entry.title: Block privileges to modify the Status field of the OBTN
entry.content:
Hi,

We created a validation to block privileges to modify the Status field of the OBTN table for some users, but the validation does not run. Could you help us?

Procedure: SBO_SP_04_Maestro_Lotes

IF (:object_type = '10000044') THEN
SELECT (SELECT T0."Status" -- Load the batch status number
FROM "OBTN" T0 
WHERE T0."AbsEntry" = :list_of_cols_val_tab_del) INTO temp_var_1 FROM DUMMY;
 
SELECT (SELECT T0."UserSign"  -- Load which user made the update
FROM "OBTN" T0 
WHERE T0."AbsEntry" = :list_of_cols_val_tab_del) INTO temp_var_2 FROM DUMMY;
 
SELECT (SELECT T0."ItemCode" 
FROM "OBTN" T0 
WHERE T0."AbsEntry" = :list_of_cols_val_tab_del) INTO temp_var_3 FROM DUMMY;
 
SELECT (SELECT Top 1 T0."Status" -- Loads the value of the status field, obtained from the audit table..
FROM "ABTN" T0 
WHERE T0."ItemCode" = :temp_var_3
And T0."ObjType"  = '10000044'
ORDER BY T0."LogInstanc" DESC) INTO temp_var_4 FROM DUMMY;
 
IF :temp_var_2 <> 28 THEN -- Asks if the update is done by a different user than user XX
IF :temp_var_1 <> :temp_var_4 THEN --  Asks if the batch status data has changed, if true
temp_var_0 := 'X'; -- the variable temp_var_0 takes the value 'B'
END IF;
END IF;
 
IF :temp_var_0 = 'X' THEN -- If the variable temp_var_0 is different from '' it generates the error.
SELECT 10 INTO error FROM DUMMY;
SELECT n'...The status of the batch cannot be changed. ...' || :temp_var_1 INTO error_message FROM DUMMY;
End IF;
 
END IF;
 
--Select the return values
Select :error, :error_message FROM dummy;
End;
 
Procedure: TransactionNotification
If (object_type = '10000044') then
CALL SBO_SP_04_Maestro_Lotes(object_type,transaction_type,num_of_cols_in_key,list_of_key_cols_tab_del,list_of_cols_val_tab_del,error,error_message);
End IF;
 
Best regards!

entry.title: SAP B1 Sales Mobile App - Crystal Report with Command Parameters
entry.content:
Hi,

I have a Crystal Report that applies a filter using this parameter:
A1@ Select Distinct "U_Familia" From OITM Order By "U_Familia" Asc

It works fine in Crystal Reports and SAP Business One.

However, in the B1 Sales mobile app, it doesn't work correctly.
It displays the parameters, but they don’t function properly.

But when you open one, a list of articles appears and not the "Familia" and "SubFamilia" list.

 

Note: The PDF is displayed correctly; the only issue is with the dropdowns, which should display the "Family" and "SubFamily" lists.

entry.title: Formatted Search - InStock - Committed with decimal point
entry.content:
Hi,
I am trying to pull the onhand - committed for an item, I added a UDF and made it Numeric

This is my formatted search

SELECT ROUND(ISNULL(T0."OnHand", 0) - ISNULL(T0."IsCommited", 0), 2)
FROM OITW T0
WHERE T0."ItemCode" = $[$5.0.0] AND T0."WhsCode" = '01

It works fine if there is no decimal in point in the Onhand or Committed, but gives me an error if there is a decimal.

Can someone give me some guidance to me?

entry.title: Bank statement processing- not all processed lines created payments or journal entries
entry.content:
Hi All,
Something strange happened when processing a bank statment via the Bank Statement Processing window. 
On the 29/07/2025 a bank statement with 222 lines were processed, but only 48 lines  actually were created as outgoing payments. The file was finalized and did not give any errors when processing. 


When clicking on the first journal entry drill down, it opens a blank Journal Entry

We do process multiple bank statements on daily basis, and it seems to be an isolated issue. Not sure what could of caused it and where to view log files to find any info regarding this issue. 
We are on version 10 for HANA, FP2208. 

Thanks all,
Jerusha

entry.title: Supplier payment flow file - SAP B1 Localisation UK
entry.content:
Hi all,

we need to be able to generate payment flows to banks from SAP B1 in the UK. We have noticed that there are already some formats that could be used in the payment methods :

SAPBPUKOPBT_BACS

SAPBPUKOPBT_BACS_TELEBANK

SAPBPUKOPBT_BACS_BARCLAY

 

but these formats are not associated with any structure and we have not been able to find it on the SAP portal to download it.

We asked our SAP BO Italian partner and this was their response:

“This template does not exist.

The bank file for SAPBPUKOPBT_BACS is actually an application (plugin .dll), which is only installed when the Payment Engine is installed.

The format is program-encoded and cannot be modified by the user.

It can be found in C:\Program Files\SAP\SAP Business One\AddOns\sap\Payment”

We have therefore installed and connected the payment add-on, but we are still encountering errors during execution. Below are some example screenshots.

Does anyone have any suggestions? 

Thank you very much.

 

Kind regards,

Barbara Camus

Add-on payment connected :

Payment Method linked to SAPBPUKOPBT_BACS :

Error while creating file :

entry.title: SAP B1 10.0 FP 2411 – OBTF / Journal Voucher: ONNM.AutoKey (ObjectCode 28) does not increment
entry.content:
Hi Experts, 

in SAP Business One 10.0 FP 2411 - MS SQL,  when adding a Journal Voucher (table OBTF), the AutoKey in ONNM for ObjectCode = 28 does not increment by +1 upon completing the operation. As a result, the next insertion attempt reuses the same BatchNum, causing the following error:
“This entry already exists in the following tables ‘Document with provisional postings’ (OBTF) (ODBC-2035) [Message 131-183]”.
The issue is temporarily resolved by manually aligning ONNM.AutoKey or restoring document numbering, but it reoccurs afterwards. 
Can you help  me? 
Thanks in advance. 

Best Regards

entry.title: DI API Problem Class COM with SAP Business One Application
entry.content:
Hello !

I share with you the solution found for a problem that i had while creating an application that communiquates with SAP Business One.

The problem (error) was :

While creating a solution for a client, requiring a connection to the SAP system, we encountered the following issue:The app is generated in 64-bit, but if SAP DIAPI 32 is installed, it points to it, resulting in a COM class error. If DIAPI 32 is not installed, the application points to 64 and works normally!
🔹 The application is correctly compiled in 64-bit.
🔹 We want to install the 32-bit DI API (in addition to the 64-bit), which is necessary for launching certain add-ons. However, when it is installed, the app crashes because it automatically connects to the 32-bit DI API instead of the 64-bit one.
👉 Result: COM error (Class not registered, Retrieving the COM class factory failed, etc.) when both versions are installed, even though the app is 64-bit.

 

Please find the solution in the following post : https://www.linkedin.com/posts/tarik-bentayeb-5a81501bb_solution-pour-un-probl%C3%A8me-di-api-sap-b1-activity-7360321854651125760-WAqv?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_android&rcm=ACoAADMZ1FAB2YZRL7QaWU7ODUDS4cddMYfS2HE

 

SAP Business One

entry.title: Second server for db Sap Business One 10
entry.content:
Good morning.
To improve the performance of the databases I currently have on an SQL server, I need to install a second server and would like to know if it's possible to use the licenses on the first one. The users are the same, but they must log in to one server or the other, depending on the company they want to consult. In the installation of SAP Business One components, I noticed a step that asks if the license server is new or already exists. Is it in this step that I can direct the second server to the first one, which is where the license manager is located?
I would appreciate any guidance and if there is a manual for configuring it.

Best regards,

Marco.
